name: Guardian Mortgage Documents
overview: Guardian Mortgage Documents, Inc. provides document preparation and delivery, automated management workflow, and outsourced closing and post-closing solutions to financial services and mortgage industries in the United States. Its products include Next Generation Input System, a Web-based document preparation and input processing system that enables users to produce, manage, and deliver various documents electronically; Transaction Management System, a Web-based workflow management solution; and Total Loan Solution Technology, which automates various document production, management, and workflow functions into a paperless portal. The company also offers documents compliance, maintenance, and development services; and mortgage fulfillment outsource services, including vendor management, title and escrow, closing coordination, and document preparation services for the lending industry. In addition, it provides post-closing services, such as reviewing and merging underwrite packages with final signed document package; conducting post-closing audits; creating and delivering discrepancy reports; and stacking and delivering post-closing packages to investors. Further, the company offers training information. It serves various professionals, lenders, mortgage bankers, brokers, banks, attorneys, and credit unions. The company was founded in 1987 and is based in Denver, Colorado. As of August 27, 2008, Guardian Mortgage Documents, Inc. operates as a subsidiary of LenderLive Network, Inc.
